Profile

Over 10 years of experience in web development and website layout on various CMS platforms, I decided to expand my knowledge and transition to frontend development more than a year and a half ago. During this period, I participated in the development of two React projects in a company and independently developed a project using Vue.js. All three projects represent different business domains with varying scopes and scales of work. Additionally, there was a frontend project for a cryptocurrency exchange, involving a complete design overhaul and 160 hours of work.

My acquired experience includes:

  • - Advancement of skills in development using Vue3 + Vuex + Firebase.
  • - Enhancement in development with React + Redux + MUI + NX and various additional libraries and extensions.
  • - Improvement in the use of TypeScript as the primary tool for typing in projects.
  • - Familiarity with the Domain-Driven Design (DDD) approach in development.
  • - Significant experience in frontend development, as it is an essential part of the job.
  • - Mastery of various tools commonly used in projects and companies (Jira, Slack, Element, Tunnelblick, Time Tracker, Postman).

My skills and experience cover a broad spectrum of technologies and methodologies in frontend development. I am seeking an opportunity to contribute to a creative team where I can utilize my skills and knowledge to create innovative and high-performing web applications.
